data.text: @SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin PASS THE SAVE ACT OR GET VOTED OUT OF OFFICE. Wake up, RINO's. We know who you are.

@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin The people of Iran demand the fall of the Islamic Republic. After 40,000+ deaths, we reject any nuclear deal. This regime can only be changed by foreign military intervention. Its nuclear program is dangerous for the world. We want freedom.
@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin Time to remove Thune as Senate Majority Leader and replace the RINO with Senator Rick Scott!

@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin Can I sue you personally when they spray poison on the field next to my house and it drifts into my organic garden? How about WHEN, not if,  I and my children get cancer? Do you represent North Dakotans or foreign corporations?

@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin Glad you gave liability shield to foreign pesticide companies that are going to harm the nd people.  Guess we will be up there in cancer rates next to Iowa soon.  This is so appalling.

@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin "Gold standard science", yea like covid shots and global warming? You can't buy your science of ignorance forever fellas. Get with the program, nobody was Oreos and walmart soy cakes, thats all these farmers are good for.

@SenKevinCramer @epaleezeldin Short-term, willful ignorance for long-term pain, wow. What a great plan!!!! Big Government for Big Industry, farmers are democrats and don't even know it. Try living in a small town when these guys get to spraying. It's like dropping bug bombs in your house while ur home!
